XCONCEPT.AUTHOR: HoKoNoUmo
XCONCEPT.REFINO_DEFINITION: ** analytic-definition: Sensorial--b-concept is a [FORMAL 2000.07.28] CONCEPT with formal parts such as: 1. synonyms. 2. definition. 3. part concepts. 4. whole concepts. 5. generic concepts. 6. specific concepts. 7. environment concepts. [2000may27] I treat the structured-concept as a SYSTEM (in system's-theory terms) with objects and relations. * The 'Attributes' of the concept are RELATIONS with other systems (new concepts). I divide them into internal and external. * The 'internal-relations' with their objects constitute the quality we talk about. I represent the 'internal-objects' under the 'part-cpts' except the Synonyms/Definition objects which I represent separately because of their importance. * The 'external-relations' I represent under the 'environment-cpts' except the Whole/Generic/Specific objects which I represent separately because of their importance. [nikkas 2000apr27]
